title: Ricky Gervais | George W. Bush’s Shocking Gaffe; Republicans Vote Against Baby Formula Bill: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at former President George W. Bush accidentally confessing to being a war criminal and Republicans voting against bills that would address the nationwide shortage of baby formula.

Then, Ricky Gervais talks about his comedy special SuperNature, living on borrowed time and challenging his audiences.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
